import React, { Component } from 'react' import {DataContext} from '../Context' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import '../css/Details.css' export class Cart extends Component { static contextType = Data render() { return ( <> { product.map(item =>(

{item.title}

${item.price}

{item.description}

Color: {item.color}

{item.content}

Add to cart
)) } ) } } export default Cart
